EmailTemplate.name: Landing Page Optimization Testing.Email with 3 landing pages
EmailTemplate.subject: Stairway to the Cloud White Paper - all 3 new versions of the landing page enclosed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
Here are each of the 3 Stairway to the Cloud landing pages we've created in our new templates. Feel free to view on your mobile device as well.
Version 1 <[[https://pages.nokia.com/RP-Demo---Stairway-to-the-Cloud-White-Paper.html]]> - form on top right Version 2 <[[https://pages.nokia.com/RP-Demo---Stairway-to-the-Cloud-WP---landing-page-v2.html]]> - form on bottom Version 3 <[[https://pages.nokia.com/RP-Demo---Stairway-to-the-Cloud-WP---landing-page-v3.html]]> - form on bottom with additional text and CTA above the fold
Yours sincerely, Revenue Pulse
